name: F. Scott Fitzgerald
bio: F. Scott Fitzgerald was an American novelist and short-story writer, widely regarded as one of the greatest American writers of the 20th century.

name: Harper Lee
bio: Harper Lee was an American novelist best known for her novel To Kill a Mockingbird, which won the Pulitzer Prize.

name: George Orwell
bio: George Orwell was an English novelist, essayist, journalist, and critic. He is best known for his novels Animal Farm and 1984.

name: Jane Austen
bio: Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six major novels, which interpret, critique and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.
